relation: Categories
Campus Safety
Greek Life
Clubs and Activities
Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Bang for the buck
What to do for fun
Food and Dining
Dorm Life
Academic Rigor
Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments

Campus safety patrols 24/7. Anytime a student feels unsafe they are able to call campus safety and they will be right there. Located throughout campus they are safety stations with buttons that allow any student to press a button if feeling unsafe.
There are approximately five Greek organizations on campus. Each organization wants students to join and become a member. The organizations are very prominent on campus.
SGA is very popular at Wingate. There is many different clubs available for students. Even some classes that are offered are considered to be activities such as pottery, bird watching, yoga, etc.
Any type of student will fit in at Wingate. The campus is so diverse that it is amazing to see all of the students interact. Wingate strives to be diverse.

The campus lake is fantastic for barbeque's or getting away from being stressed. Each year students camp out for international trips. Every homecoming students tee pee the whole campus to show their pride and support.
The overall experience is wonderful. As time goes on students grow and find out more about themselves. Also being close to Charlotte is great.

The Dickson Palmer Student Center is a fantastic place to hang out with friends and do certain activities such as watch TV, play pool, practice music, etc. The sporting events are really fun because the whole campus is there supporting Wingate. Even hanging out in the dorms watching movies with friends is awesome.

Wingate's cafeteria offers many options that accomadate most needs. There is a poolside grille on campus that offers food that are found at a barbeque. Also there are small stations that offer sandwiches to go throuhgout campus.
The dorm experience is fantastic. It is great getting to know people from all over the world. The RA always has fun activities planned for the residents to interact with one another.
The academics at Wingate are very challenging and engaging. There are free tutors on campus to help with most any subject. Hard work pays off in the future when it is time to search for jobs.

Prospective students need to make sure they have financial aid situated before the semester starts. Prepare yourself for a lot of homework, but it is well worth it. The staff at Wingate is willing to help you as much as possible.

The university offers an amazing experience as a college student. Not only does the student receive fantastic education, but memories that will last forever. I love the environment that Wingate provides for its students.
pageTitle: Wingate University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {62438=Wingate University is a small, private school in North Carolina around 45 minutes outside of downtown Charlotte. The school has around 1800 undergraduate students and many of those are athletes. If you do not play a sport at Wingate you are left with one of three options, join greek life, transfer, or stay and be miserable., 151049=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 13808=It was the perfect fit for me. The student to teacher ratio is 14:1 and the campus is small, around 1,800 students (2,300 including graduates), so you get to know people on campus, but it's not so small where you feel as though you see the same people all the time. Not a big party school, but was fun to apartment-hop on the weekends and hang out with a lot of different people., 116882=The cafeteria is being renovated for the fall of 2013 so the facilities will be much nicer! The food has been improving since I've been here and is showing signs of improving in the future! We have the cafeteria, the Klondike Poolside, we are getting an Einstein's Bagels in the fall, and we're also getting a new dining option in the Spring of 2014 that is supposed to be kind of like a ruby tuesday., 5136=The price to attend is pretty much ridiculous considering the facilities AND considering there are no 24 hr buildings or food places. The school has been around since 1896 and I feel that it shows. Changes and upgrades are being made but maybe the most important ones are not. There are some good teachers at Wingate; some who have been there for years and years. This is my second year and one of my teachers, who is also my advisor, has helped me out a lot. Not only did he help me with my school but had a listening ear when I needed someone to talk to., 20629=Wingate University is a private university in Wingate, North Carolina home of the bulldogs. Wingate University was founded in 1896. It has more than 2,500 students., 117570=The dorms are like any other college campus. Wingate is renovating it's old All freshman male dorm into a beautiful new residence hall, complete with a new pool and courtyard. There is also a brand new residence hall that was completed for the Spring semester of 2013. It's mostly for freshman accommodations.}

textAfterTable: I don't really know how to talk about this section because different teachers/professors teach differently while we as students, learn differently. There are some really good teachers at school. Some of the ones I've had have been there for 10+ years.. One teacher I have tends to trail off, get long-winded or lose track of time so I feel like they talk so much we don't get much done. All teachers have their office hours which, in my experiences, they are happy to help you. Keep your appointments if you should make any with your teachers/advisor though. That's important. Login to rate or flag the reviews Brittany 12/15/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 4 out of 4 people found this review useful. 3 of 33 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Wingate is great for students who learn better one-on-one and in small classrooms. Wingate is also in between cities and rural so students who want a little bit of both would enjoy Wingate. Bang for the buck
